headline: St. Paul-based corporation matched donations to Minnesota Freedom Fund
author: Anthony Gockowski
sentences:
(snip) According to a screenshot provided to Alpha News, the Minnesota Freedom Fund was listed as a “featured charity” on the “Ecolab Giving Site” under a section titled “racial and social inequity.”
Comments:
one of the largest and oldest names in Minnesota business abetting our criminal terrorists.. wonder if this will get to the MSM
In an email to Alpha News, a spokesperson with Ecolab confirmed that the Ecolab Foundation provided a 50% match for employee donations to the Minnesota Freedom Fund.
A St. Paul-based corporation encouraged its employees to donate money to a nonprofit that has bailed out countless violent criminals.
